title: Annie in wonderland
body: i purchased a mystery skin chest and got annie in wonderland and i was wondering why i cannot see the skin in the shop is it extinct / rare?

replies.body:
Hey PinkPanther19, 

This is a legacy skin, which means it's not always available, which is why it normally doesn't display in the shop.
Wait, Annie in Wonderland is a legacy skin?

> [{quoted}](name=Bear Ranger,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=4AeJEeyR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-28T20:01:55.775+0000)
>
> Wait, Annie in Wonderland is a legacy skin?

Yup! You can check out the full list of legacy skins [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins).
CONGRATULATION!  YOU GOT A BEAUTIFUL, RARE, LEGACY SKIN!!!! Tell me sir, how are you feeling right now?!!!!
quite happy i guess haha i didn't know if it was good or not , only started on monday bought 4150rp ,opened 2 mystery skin chests and got  cotton tail teemo and then this annie skin

Well, welcome to the club. gl hf :)

Make sure you keep an eye on the [sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/) every Tuesday/ Friday and occasional events to cut down on those RP expenses.

its a pretty awesome skin, the only problem is that its a legendary skin that is equivalent to a 750rp skin in terms of design, but you did save a lot of money in comparison to those who paid the 1820 for the new Tibbers model that is now on every skin of hers.
